text: Max Schmitt in a Single Scull is an oil painting by Thomas Eakins. It was painted in 1871. The picture measures 32.6 x 46.3 cm. It hangs in the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York City. The painting sets on the Schuylkill River in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Category:1870s paintings Category:Paintings by Thomas Eakins Category:Paintings in the Metropolitan Museum of Art, New York City
title: Max Schmitt in a Single Scull
